level: Senior Practitioner in Hatha, Vinyasa Flow, Iyengar
bio: Surekha has studied numerous styles of meditation, yoga, chanting and other spiritual practices and is trained Ashtanga, Satyananda, and Forrest yoga. He has a great love for the traditional as he has taken studies in Sanskrit, and is a qualified Vedic chanting teacher. Craig teaches so that people can experience the healing effects of yoga, create change in themselves and live with empowerment and confidence.
teachingAccreditations:
200hr Kevala Yoga Teaching Diploma
500hr Satyananda Yoga
200hr Hot Power Yoga
500hr Forrest Yoga
